discussion.author: StefanKarpinski
discussion.text: Decided to go with the conservative option and register Tar.jl now with a 0.1 version number. The intention is that it can include broader functionality in the future, which may entail changing a few defaults, hence the pre-1.0 version number to give some room to grow.

discussion.author: StefanKarpinski
discussion.text: Given that the previous PR for Tar was open for 4 days and this only changes the initial version number, it should be acceptable to merge this some time today.
